about_the_game:
The setting is modern Japan, Kanagawa Prefecture. The characters are all normal, life-sized students and working adults.
A simulation RPG with a unique world view, where you fight with bikes and fists instead of swords and magic!

It is also equipped with functions such as ``action rewind function'' and ``unit reinforcement during intermission.''
This is an authentic model that will satisfy SRPG fans!



Many characters with various skills and unique actions appear!
Develop your favorite character, utilize their individuality, and defeat powerful enemies!
*22 characters will be playable in the early access version.



A three-part story depicting the fierce battle that took place over three years at Gyoun High School.
Please enjoy this intense, momentary, and passionate drama about boys and girls.

*The early access version includes the scenario of "Part 1: Murakumo Alliance", which is 1/3 of the total.
*The demo version includes early stages 1 to 3.
Save data from the demo version can be carried over to the early access version.



This game uses a "mixed turn system" system in which battles take place at the same time as your own and enemy's turns, and the order of enemy and ally actions is mixed up.
A new type of strategy that tests both your judgment to overcome the ever-changing war situation and your long-term strategic eye!

■About video distribution

You may freely distribute the video of this work as long as it does not violate public order and morals.
When posting or distributing, please include the URL of this store page in the summary section.


Powered by "CRIWARE".CRIWARE is a trademark of CRI Middleware Co., Ltd.
detailed_description:
The setting is modern Japan, Kanagawa Prefecture. The characters are all normal, life-sized students and working adults.
A simulation RPG with a unique world view, where you fight with bikes and fists instead of swords and magic!

It is also equipped with functions such as ``action rewind function'' and ``unit reinforcement during intermission.''
This is an authentic model that will satisfy SRPG fans!



Many characters with various skills and unique actions appear!
Develop your favorite character, utilize their individuality, and defeat powerful enemies!
*22 characters will be playable in the early access version.



A three-part story depicting the fierce battle that took place over three years at Gyoun High School.
Please enjoy this intense, momentary, and passionate drama about boys and girls.

*The early access version includes the scenario of "Part 1: Murakumo Alliance", which is 1/3 of the total.
*The demo version includes early stages 1 to 3.
Save data from the demo version can be carried over to the early access version.



This game uses a "mixed turn system" system in which battles take place at the same time as your own and enemy's turns, and the order of enemy and ally actions is mixed up.
A new type of strategy that tests both your judgment to overcome the ever-changing war situation and your long-term strategic eye!

fullgame.name: Dramatic Road : the origin of wind

name: Dramatic Road : the origin of wind Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Core i5-3340M
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Core i5-4460S
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GT1030
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

short_description: A full-fledged simulation RPG set in modern Japan! A variety of characters unique to modern times, such as riders, magicians, and baseball players, have appeared. Command them, nurture them, and use their skills to protect the peace of the school! The demo version includes early stages 1 to 3.
